input.sentences: st. [male] 's day in my town can be very crazy ! we have a festival to celebrate .
we like to dress in green and drink lots of beer with our friends .
there 's usually a parade with some guys in kilts that play irish music .
i meet lots of pretty girls ! that 's always a plus .
then we visit the booths to play games and win prizes !
output.sentences: My friend got to wear his big hat at the town festival.
St. Patrick's Day calls for lots of green and drinking with friends.
We sat and watched the parade as they played music.
We got to meet a lot of pretty girls.
You could win prizes if you visited the booths
